FROM_SENDER.description: The name and email address to send from.

SPARKPOST_API_KEY.description: The Sparkpost API key. Leave blank to use a fresh Heroku Add-on instance.

SENTRY_DSN.description: A token from https://getsentry.com for error reporting. Leave blank to disable.

DEBUG.description: Whether to run in debug mode. (Do not use debug mode on production!)
